thread.title: Galen James plays excellent music with 'Big Blue Mixtape'
thread.title_full: Galen James plays excellent music with 'Big Blue Mixtape' | Examiner.com

author: J.L. Herrera
title: Galen James plays excellent music with 'Big Blue Mixtape'
text:
Galen James Promo pic by Galen James Galen James hits the right notes with new release Big Blue Mixtape and shows potent magic with his creativity. The pop-jazz-fusion style that James displays in his new release unveils a music that is almost excellent candy to the ear.
James is a multi-talented singer, producer, songwriter, and performer based in Los Angeles and does a great job at creating an album that displays his true love for music. The 20-track creation by James is a compilation of songs from his career and it is the real deal.
The recording displays true musicianship that carries a bunch of different styles and has the ability to speak to the common person. Many music lovers of different genres will like this recording because it is simply a brilliant piece of work.
Galen James tackles all the songs with superb songwriting and singing. Many of his songs involve a horn section that are pretty powerful and add style to his music. It does seem to give the listener that the music is jazzy, but other songs in the collection of this recording give in a pop sensation to it.
The third song “Body Karate” has an easy-listening feel to it, and it tends to be a different entity compared to the first two songs, “African” and “Stars”. Still, James manages to capture the listener with a good voice and just plain good music.
Big Blue Mixtape also comes with some live recordings which are incredible. Again, the compilation is filled with different types of genres, yet still falling as one beautifully put-together creation that reacts as one.
“ The Other Me ” is a song that has a pop-R&B feel to it. At the same time, the guitars on this track are played with a ska style at times. The final sound is quite good and it ends up being a killer song.
There is also some funk involve by having some keyboards go at it in some of the songs in this recording by James. It never stops to amaze the listener how good the songs are and how each song is approached with a different style.
In the end, Big Blue Mixtape by Galen James has the right notes to be a good piece to add to anyone’s collection of music. It displays a lot of talent by putting out a sound that is very jazzy with hints of R&B. It is downright good music and a good piece to own.
